ygData.subject: Re: AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it actually does yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought this was supposed to be an area effect Cancel Magic spell, it wouldn t keep the casters from casting, but I thought that it would remove what ever
ygData.messageBody:
I thought this was supposed to be an area effect Cancel Magic spell, it
wouldn't keep the casters from casting, but I thought that it would remove
what ever effects that your party had had cast on them.

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 10:25 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it
> actually does yet?
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> I have found the same thing. I think it is broken. I petitioned a while
> back when i hit 40, and a guide said he thinks it is broken too (like that
> helps).
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 3:06 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it actually
> > does yet?
> >
> >
> > From: jhenders@...
> >
> >
> > Has anyone figured out what this song actually does? It's an
> > area effect
> > and mobs consider it hostile I've found, but, dispite the name, it
> > doesn't seem to inhibit mob casters from casting. So what is
> > it supposed
> > to do?
> >
